channel.title: CVE Feed for 42gears -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 42gears -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-2331|2023-04-28T07:16:21.298Z -- 42gears -- surelock%20%20windows
item.description: Unquoted service Path or Element vulnerability in 42Gears Surelock Windows SureLock Service (NixService.Exe) on Windows application will allows to insert arbitrary code into the service. This issue affects Surelock Windows : from 2.3.12 through 2.40.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-2335|2023-04-27T17:57:35.096Z -- 42gears -- surelock%20windows
item.description:
Plaintext Password in Registry
vulnerability in 42gears surelock windows surelockwinsetupv2.40.0.Exe on Windows (Registery modules) allows Retrieve
Admin user credentials
This issue affects surelock windows: from 2.3.12 through 2.40.0.
